workshoptitle: Modernize MySQL Applications with OCI Cloud-Native Technology

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always first. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create compartment
tutorials.description: Create OCI Compartment for the lab

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Provision OCI Kubernetes and MySQL HeatWave using OCI Resource Manager
tutorials.description: Provision OCI Kubernetes and MySQL HeatWave using OCI Resource Manager

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Load data into MySQL HeatWave
tutorials.description: Use mysql shell to load airportdb data set to MySQL HeatWave cluster

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Deploy PHP application to OCI Kubernetes
tutorials.description: Deploy PHP application to OCI Kubernetes

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Accelerate complex queries using MySQL HeatWave
tutorials.description: Accelerate complex queries using MySQL HeatWave
